title: lolclient.exe has stopped working

replies.body:
You mentioned that you go this problem 2 days ago, but has it been occurring every time that you have attempted to login since?

Since it appears that this is a message being prompted by the OS, it sounds like there is something blocking League from launching correctly.  Given you've tried to repair and re-install, it doesn't sound like there is a corruption with the installation itself.  At this point, I would like to make sure that you have the proper OS Permissions to launch League correctly.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).

If you are still experiencing issues, reply back and let me know!
